name: what-happened-today
title: What Happened Today
description: Discover historical events, notable birthdays, and milestones on any date.
author: nikhil_tiwari

commands.name: get-events-today
commands.title: This Day In History
commands.description: Get the historical events that happened on this day.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
